statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT username, access_level FROM user_authentication;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT MAX(user_id) AS max_user_id FROM user_authentication;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, access_level FROM user_authentication WHERE access_level = 'admin' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND access_level = 'user' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE access_level = 'admin' OR access_level = 'moderator' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT access_level FROM user_authentication WHERE access_level LIKE 'a%' ORDER BY access_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE password LIKE '%pass%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT username, password FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id ORDER BY u.username ASC, r.role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT roles.role_name, users.username FROM roles JOIN user_roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id JOIN users ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id
SELECT MAX(user_id) AS max_user_id FROM users
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id ASC, role_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY permission_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE description LIKE '%access%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
